name: Sweet Combat
overview: As the eldest daughter of the Fang Conglomerate, Fang Yu was raised to become the sole successor of the company, yet she goes against her family's objections to pursue boxing and won the championship title at the young age of 18. On the other hand, Ming Tian comes from a poor family. He once stopped schooling for three years in order to work and he decided to apply for a sports scholarship despite not having any background whatsoever. Fang Yu was one of the first to see his talents and their relationship grows over time.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Ming Tian accepts a scholarship to the athletically obsessed Zhengze Sports University without realizing that he's their first and only male student.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Sick of being in the spotlight, Ming Tian puts in for a transfer but crosses paths with Zhengze's reigning martial arts champion.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Forced to join a club, Ming Tian gets whipped into shape by a rowdy bunch of rivals.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Ming Tian tries to find a way out of fighting Fang Yu in the tournament finals but is faced with a tough choice.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Instead of fighting, Ming Tian and Fang Yu get close while cleaning a pool. Perhaps too close.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: After agreeing to training, Ming Tian finds himself with another new job. Will he be able to keep this one?

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Ming Tian's training intensifies. Meanwhile, the local bully sets his sights on our favorite student.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Ming Lang suddenly falls ill and his big brother is nowhere to be found.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: In order to stay in school Ming Tian must train hard do well in the upcoming tournament.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: With everyone practicing hard the President tries to alleviate the animosity between Zhengze and Zhiying with a dance.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: Fighting is easy but getting ready for a formal dance... that is not as easy as expected.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: The dance doesn't go as planned for some but it was a positive experience for others.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: After the dance everyone is focused on the tournament... well almost everyone, Song Xiao Mi is focused on Ming Tian.

episodes.name: Episode 14
episodes.overview: Fang Yu is worried that someone will tell Ming Tian about her feelings about him.

episodes.name: Episode 15
episodes.overview: Misunderstandings lead to heart aches and future heart break.

episodes.name: Episode 16
episodes.overview: The big day is finally here, will Ming Tian be able to do perform well enough keep his spot at Zhengze?

episodes.name: Episode 17
episodes.overview: After all the help he has received Ming Tian is finally able to help his seniors with something.

episodes.name: Episode 18
episodes.overview: Will Ya Nan and Xiao Mi pass their English test? Fang Yu's grandfather continues to add to her family business workload.

episodes.name: Episode 19
episodes.overview: A day at the theme park creates opportunity for Fang Yu and Ming Tian to spend more time together. But Fang Yu's grandpa have another suitor in mind for Fang Yu.

episodes.name: Episode 20
episodes.overview: The gang prepares for a friendly competition in Macau and chooses Ming Tian to be their coach.

episodes.name: Episode 21
episodes.overview: Ming Tian's challenge to Xiao Feng plays out in the ring.

episodes.name: Episode 22
episodes.overview: The crew travels to Macau, but can they stay out of trouble?

episodes.name: Episode 23
episodes.overview: After Xiao Feng leaves Macau early, she must be apart from her new love for the first time.

episodes.name: Episode 25
episodes.overview: Ming Tian entertains an aggravating proposal from Fang Yu's grandpa.

episodes.name: Episode 26
episodes.overview: A series of misfortunes befall Ming Tian just as he started getting along with Fang Yu's family.

episodes.name: Episode 27
episodes.overview: Xiao Mi and Sun Hao discover the root of all of Ming Tian's troubles, but aren't sure what to do.

episodes.name: Episode 28
episodes.overview: Fang Yu struggles with Ming Tian after learning his father killed her uncle.

episodes.name: Episode 30
episodes.overview: Chairman Fang's plan seems to be working as new information changes Fang Yu's priorities.

episodes.name: Episode 31
episodes.overview: With less things to keep her home Fang Yu moves forward with her plan to study abroad.

episodes.name: Episode 32
episodes.overview: It seems when it comes to facing Fang Yu in a fight Wu Ji won't take no for an answer.

episodes.name: Episode 33
episodes.overview: Ming Tian learns the death strike in order to help Fang Yu and it leads to him getting hurt.

episodes.name: Episode 34
episodes.overview: Everyone supports Ming Tian as best they can as they wait for him to wake up.

episodes.name: Episode 35
episodes.overview: Despite his best efforts there just seems no chance for Ming Tian and Fang Yu to remain together.

episodes.name: Episode 36
episodes.overview: As one couple says their goodbye romance begins to blossoms for others.

episodes.name: Episode 37
episodes.overview: As time passed and things changed one thing stayed the same, how Ming Tian and Fang Yu feel for each other.
